content: **buy rustic jar cozy pattern get the rustic jar lid pattern for free add both in your basket and the disscount should add automatically ** crochet this rustic jar lid cover to brighten up your jar lids this jar lid hugger is super quick and easy to make it adds a great little detail to the glass jars **this pattern can be size adjusted by ** - making less or more row - not doing chain between stitches - making half_double_crochet or double_crochet instead of treble_crochet **crochet level beginner** **you will need 1x old glass jar lid glue / hot glue or sock stop** glue or sock stop is used to make the lid cover to stay better in place it is not necessary but highly recommended **➡️ while choosing which one to use note that ** if you use **sockstop** the crocheted part will be removable to wash if you instead use **glue** you will not be able to remove it from the lid later happy crocheting
